name: venue-monorepo
description: VENUE: Event & Movie Booking Platform - Production-grade full-stack booking system
author: PIYUSH SONI

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd venue-backend && npm install && cd ../venue-frontend && npm install
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:backend -- --ci && npm run test:frontend -- --ci
scripts.build:backend: cd venue-backend && echo 'Backend uses Node.js directly, no build needed'
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd venue-backend && npm run lint || echo 'Add lint script to backend'
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.k6:all: cd venue-backend && npm run k6:load && npm run k6:booking && npm run k6:rate-limit
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push origin main --tags
scripts.prepare: node -e "try { require('husky').install() } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e }" || echo 'Husky not installed, skipping git hooks setup'
